log_level_comment: Levels: ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG, DEEP (most verbose).
log_level_affects: DEEP enables cross-system tracing for commands/gestures.
log_level_hint: log_level: ERROR | WARN | INFO | DEBUG | DEEP
stt_provider_hint: STT provider: whisper-local only (no cloud/API keys required)
command_parse_timeout_hint: Timeout for LLM command parsing in /gestures/command.
voice_silence_threshold_hint: Audio level threshold for voice detection (0.0 to 1.0)
voice_silence_duration_hint: Seconds of silence before stopping recording
voice_max_record_duration_hint: Maximum seconds to record before forcing transcription
voice_min_voice_duration_hint: Minimum seconds of continuous voice before starting a recording
voice_pre_roll_hint: Audio pre-roll seconds to include before voice detection
voice_min_gap_hint: Minimum gap between recordings to prevent rapid retriggers
voice_send_to_executor_hint: If true, send voice transcripts to the command executor
voice_use_legacy_pause_threshold_hint: If true, use voice_pause_threshold_ms instead of silence_duration
voice_noise_gate_enabled_hint: Apply a fast noise gate to reduce constant background noise
voice_noise_gate_threshold_hint: Audio level below this is attenuated (0.0 to 1.0)
